data.title: After PDP absorbs PSB, Sng wants consolidation with PRS
data.meta_description: Build on historic ties, consolidate ruling coalition, says Julau MP.
data.text:
In the aftermath of the Progressive Democratic Party (PDP) absorbing leaders and members of Parti Sarawak Bersatu (PSB), Julau MP Larry Sng has called for a PDP-Parti Rakyat Sarawak (PRS) merger in the future.

In a brief statement on Facebook, the Parti Bangsa Malaysia (PBM) president expressed the hope that PDP and PRS could build on their historical ties and consolidate the stateâ€™s ruling coalition.

Both parties...
